Webonomics 1.0 documentation

3.5. Text Formatting Elements

«  3.4. Tables and Lists   ::   Contents   ::   4. Basic CSS  »

3.5. Text Formatting Elements¶

  1. Let us have a look on some more elements like <b> and <i>, for formatting the output, like bold and italics.

3.5.1. Marquee¶

#. This tag helps to make a text scroll across the page. We can specify its height, direction and other attributes.

  1. Syntax: <marquee> Text </marquee>

3.5.2. Bold¶

  1. HTML <b> element defines bold text.
  2. Syntax: <b> Bold Text</b>

3.5.3. Italics¶

  1. HTML <i> element defines italic text.
  2. Syntax: <i> Italic Text </i>

3.5.4. Emphasize¶

  1. HTML <em> element defines emphasized text, with added semantic importance.
  2. Syntax: <em> Emphasized text </em>

3.5.5. Marked¶

  1. HTML <mark> element defines highlighted text.
  2. Syntax: <mark> highlighted text </mark>

3.5.6. Deleted and Inserted¶

  1. HTML <del> element defines a deleted text. It shows a strike through the text.
  2. Syntax: <del> Deleted text </del>
  3. HTML <ins> defines inserted text.
  4. Syntax: <ins> inserted text</ins>

3.5.7. Subscript and Superscript¶

  1. HTML <sub> defines subscripted text.
  2. Syntax: H <sub>2</sub> O , which shows the chemical formula for water.
  3. HTML <sup> defines superscripted text.
  4. Syntax: x <sup> 2 </sup>, which shows x raised to power 2.
  5. All above discussed elements are shown in below exmaple :

<!DOCTYPE html>

<html>
<head>
<title> More Example </title>
<style>
        h1 {
                text-align:center;
        }

</style>
</head>

<body style="background-color:cyan">
        <h1 id="top">Hello World</h1>
        <h1 style="color:blue">How</h1>
        <h1>Are</h1>
        <h1>You</h1>


        <!--Text Formattings -->
        <marquee> This is within the marquee tag </marquee>
        <b> bold <b><br>
        <i> Italics </i><br>
        <em> emphasized </em><br>
        <mark> Highlighted </mark><br>
        <del> deleted text </del><br>
        <ins> inserted text </ins><br>
        H<sub> 2 </sub>O<br>
        x<sup> 2 </sup>
</body>
</html>
